name: Brad Robinson Jr
text: The food has always been good. Hungry Howies works well with the weight watchers program too. They have this one guy that works there that seems like he wasn't meant for customer service. Not a people person, seems to forget about part of your order. May not be the job for him.

name: tauhid ahmed
text: Customer service is always awesome. Today it was more special as my brother and sister in law came from Virginia and I brought them here saying this is the best pizza place in Cleveland. They loved the pizza as Mike who was at that time …More

name: BJ L.
text: Nice little corner spot. Good deals and solid pizza.

name: sandman5m
text: Well all these stars are well deserved and i have been a loyal hungry howies fane since the mid 90s! When i lived in bowling green, ohio best food on the planet

name: John Jones
text: The customer service is excellent 5 star, but oh, I ordered a pizza and pepperoni rolls yesterday  and they were both flat as a pancake,  so weird. Today I tried the Barbecue wings, oh they were burnt and my sub had a burnt taste also. Very disappointed,  I probably just clogged my arteries.

name: Drake Smith
text: Love Hungry Howies! Great selection of pizza and wings!

name: Lavonne Mccall
text: Exceptional customer service from “Dakota” tonight 10/19/19. He went above and beyond for a special order request. Will absolutely order again and recommend!

name: Carter Jutte
text: possibly the best pizza ever, definitely the best crust

name: Joseph D'Angelo
text: I haven't tried the pizza but if it's as good as the sandwiches were and they were the bomb

name: Jeff Svoboda
text: This place sucks I ordered a month ago and was great and then I ordered tonight and I think they forgot to put sauce on my pizza. Don’t go there if you like sauce but if you do ask for extra extra sauce and you may get a spoonful. It doesn’t deserve a 1 star rating

name: Sunny Sharma
text: A great spot for pickup.  They tend to have coupons available on their website.  I recently tried the deep dish pizza and was impressed.  My wife is a fanatic when it comes to the Cajun bread.  Whenever we are in town we have to have it

name: Stephan N
text: Extremely fast and consistent. Online ordering works every time without a hitch. Friendly staff and clean facility.

name: Joel R
text: I scream every time I order! It's delicious! I've never eaten anything from this particular Howie s but it's high time to give them 12 stars. Oink. Don't test my pizza eating skills, I will make you astounded

name: megan peck
text: Normally when I get a salad from a pizza shop it isn't that good,  but I've never been disappointed by hungry howie's salads.  Always delicious

name: nikkilotus
text: Placed an order for delivery and it took an hour and 15 minutes to get to us. I could see that happening on a busy Saturday, not a Tuesday. When we got our food, the deep dish pizza was lukewarm and burnt. They forgot the flavored crust. …More

name: Tasfique Ahmed
text: Great food with great service. Mike is awasome. He understand the need of customers before asking. As we were eating the pizza inside he offer us plates and glasses for soda. Please keep it up.

name: Melanie Grandberry
text: This is the best pizza and service! Im lovin those different flavor crust!

name: Carl G
text: Great pizza friendly staff

name: Darleen Lavoie
text: Very good service, Great pizza and not to expensive.

name: chris theis
text: I wasn’t very impressed with this place. I have ordered from here a while back and it was pretty good, but no so much now. It’s seems they got skimpy with their toppings. Also, they messed up my order. I asked for a half and half pizza, one …More

name: John Doe
text: Everytime I order a pizza with flavored crust. They never put it on. Never again will I go back. 5 times is to many for me and my order was free once. Better off trying a different location

name: Raquel Holland
text: Pizza is good. Workers are not too bright.

name: James Quinones
text: Ever since the completely incompetent Garrett became district manager of Westlake, Lakewood and Parma,   these stores have all gone downhill. The friendly service that I came to expect out of Westlake completely gone,  and the quality of …More

name: Elizabeth Tatar
text: I wouldn’t give any stars if I could. Ordered pepperoni got plain cheese. Even tho my order says Elizabeth got called a man, sir, bud by multiple people. My family has been ordering from them since I can remember and I never will again.

name: YOGI Behra
text: Good low priced pizza.

name: BILL SCHULZ
text: We get it all the time.  folks are great.  If they make a mistake, they take care of it. Za is excellent and so are the salads at a better price that almost everyone who matters.

name: kayla leigh
text: Just received a deep dish pizza which was burnt. I was called to complain & was told a deep dish went through the oven twice which is why my pizza is burnt. In addition to that the employee who answers the phone is rude.

name: Omar Assad
text: Hello I called in today to hungry Howie's and was like asking what I should to get it because I was clueless about the menu a man by the name of Mike give me many options and greeted me in a nice way.  Mike informed me of many different …More

name: Naomi Strollo
text: Been there only twice. The service is lacking. Both times they seemed confused. Today when i arrived on time my order wasnt ready. i took the beverage to the car came back in. after waiting 15min i asked when my order was ready. the other …More

name: Naimah Moore
text: Its very cost efficient, fast service, good food

name: Alexander Halaszyn
text: Great, classic pizza for a good price. The different spices you can pick from for the crust are super delicious, and their gf crust is great!

name: Tracy Yalanty
text: Will always love this place!

name: Harrison Keppler
text: Great place for sheet pizza. The flavored crust is good too.

name: Jeff Potts
text: vegi calzone to die for, used to be, must be new owner or something now is a below average  wilted lettuce no mushroom, that being said Mike called me and offered me a credit so I will try it again, this one was back to normal besides I'll have to remember light on onions lol no one come near me

name: John White
text: Pretty much an in and out, not really for eating in. Staff was nice, floors were pretty dirty. Wish they were open later

name: William M
text: Nice change from the normal, get a flavored crust

name: Kevin Moran
text: Was better with the older owner

name: Kate Tuma
text: I sat on hold for over 15 minutes, finally drove up to the store and their excuse was "we had difficulties when we arrived." Dissapointed honestly.

name: poetic weaver
text: Great pizza

name: Tiff Stickle
text: love this pizza

name: Graham Nieder
text: Mediocre pizza on the same level as Domino's.

name: Crystal Haynik
text: Very slow store & it's unfortunate.

name: Becka Reed
text: Quick service!

name: Nick Montanaro
text: Good pizza

name: DestinyKay Bailey
text: Mike is always on point!

name: Steven Hite
text:
(Translated by Google) Ok pizza

(Original)
Ok pizza
